Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel in a very good location”

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Value & Location”
Reviews.Author: WOBM
Reviews.Content: money paid hotel couldnt staff incredibly friendly helpful hand whatever fairly standard didnt matter barely sleeping rooftop terrace absolutely stunning swimming pool incredible views city sagrada familia famous casa mila built gaudi viewable terrace hotel tho location situated 5 minute stroll placa de catalunya connects la rambla choose metro 20 minutes citys attractions highly reccommended perfect short weekend break
